about_the_game:
Step into the heart-pounding world of Top Jump: the exhilarating prologue that will put your speed and agility to the test! Embark on an epic ascent through the treacherous cave, leaping from platform to platform, all while avoiding deadly traps and obstacles. This action-packed prologue offers a thrilling taste of the full Top Jump experience, where every jump counts and every second matters.

In this prologue version, you'll get a glimpse of the challenging terrain. Although the prologue offers only a portion of the map, it's enough to showcase the adrenaline-fueled excitement that lies ahead. Prepare to be captivated by the vibrant visuals and immersive gameplay that will leave you craving more!

Ready to be a part of the Top Jump legacy? Add this prologue to your gaming collection now and get a taste of the vertical racing adventure that awaits.

name: Top Jump: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Introducing Top Jump: The thrilling prologue that tests your speed and agility! Scale the cave, avoid obstacles, and race for the top spot on the limited map. Get a taste of the action now !
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
